FundsTransferred(uint256).details: Event emitted on transfer funds to pool.

ProtocolTokenFeeClaimed(address,uint256).details: Event emitted on claim of protocol token fee.

claimAvailable().details: Is claim available for vested tokens.

getTotalPurchasedValue().details: Get total value of all purchased tokens

getTotalVestedValue().details: Get total value of all vestied tokens

initialize(address,(uint256,uint256,uint.details: Constructor function, can only be called once

lockedBalanceOf(address).details: Locked balance of account in current TGE

maxPurchaseOf(address).details: How many tokens an address can purchase.

params.amount: amount of tokens in wei (10**18 = 1 token)

redeem().details: Return purchased tokens and get back tokens paid

transferFunds().details: Transfer proceeds from TGE to pool's treasury. Claim protocol fee.

transferUnlocked().details: Is transfer available for lockup preference tokens.

isProtocolTokenFeeClaimed.details: Protocol token fee is a percentage of tokens sold during TGE. Returns true if fee was claimed by the governing DAO.

isUserWhitelisted.details: Mapping of user's address to whitelist status

lockupTVLReached.details: Is lockup TVL reached. Users can claim their tokens only if lockup TVL was reached.

purchaseOf.details: Mapping of an address to total amount of tokens purchased during TGE

totalPurchased.details: Total amount of tokens purchased during TGE

vestedBalanceOf.details: Mapping of addresses to total amounts of tokens vested

vestingTVLReached.details: Is vesting TVL reached. Users can claim their tokens only if vesting TVL was reached.
